text: hi everyone today I'm making our lumber
or butter beef to be honest this is not
the popular dish in Vietnam but don't
know why I have received so many
requests from you guys for it so I gave
it a try and was totally in love let's
begin the ingredients you're gonna need
some garlic shallots ginger neck plan
some bloody fingers or okra and half a
pie Apple to make the sauce first you
want to peel the pie opposed remove the
eyes and the core and cut into chunks
then transfer to a four processor tube
lit with two large cloves of garlic
chupa add chillies and a tablespoon of
sugar processing to your dancing will be
fine paste you can also use pie apple in
a can depending on the saltiness of the
anchovy sauce that you have you can add
somewhere in between three tablespoons
to a quarter or third cup have a tight
and add more or less to your liking cut
the kalakashi logs into thin slices for
the smaller clothes you can slightly
mesh to release the oil cut the ginger
into thin slices stuffing on each other
and slide into fine strips for the beef
use a tender cut less annoyed or I are
proud identify the green and slide the
beef into thin slices against the grain
season the beef lightly with some salt
pepper and chili flakes we gonna serve
with the attribute sauce later so don't
over season the beef give it a good mix
and set aside for the okra remove the
stem and cut into thin slices on the
diagonal
also cut the eggplants into thin slices
on the diagonal stop the eggplants into
salted water to prevent darkening now
arrange everything on the platter I'm
gonna cheat a little bit by using a
small bowl turn upside down and place
the bib slices on top it looks really
neat and it seems like we have a lot
there you have everything ready the beef
the eggplants the okra future I also add
some green chillies here you also need a
plate a brochure which includes lettuce
and fresh Vietnamese herbs like mint
Asian bezos or cilantro and some rice to
Missa leaves as well
now on a hot plate melt a large cubes of
butter until completely melted and then
add the garlic shallots and ginger to
make it really fragrant take a last
slice of beef and quickly dip into the
hot butter if you like it rare fry the
beef in the butter just a few seconds
besides well I wish YouTube have the
smell button so you can smell all this
the butter is so salsify comes when
infused with the ginger garlic and
shallots and that you see there
[Music]
also fry the okra and eggplant to add
more texture into the roll
now this is how you serve this you're
going to take a piece of rice paper and
dip into water to soften then place it
on a plate and arrange the vegetables
some rice vermicelli on top I will slice
a fish some okra and eggplant and
quickly roll it up dip into that amazing
sauce it's so fragrant
so fresh and full of flavor give me a
thumbs up if you like it thank you for
watching bye bye
